name: freeze-shock
caption: Freeze Shock

effect.short: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has a 30% chance to [paralyze]{mechanic:paralysis} the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

flavorText:
On the second turn, the user hits the target with
electrically charged ice. This may also leave the
target with paralysis.
